ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing bards
ygData.msgSnippet: True it happens on occasion - I can count, um three or four times since March of 99 when I started playing this game...  But for Bards - happens at least
ygData.messageBody:
True it happens on occasion - I can count, um three or four times since
March of '99 when I started playing this game... But for Bards - happens at
least three or four times A WEEK!

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 9:17 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing bards

uhmmm, well, last time i was in seb, grouped with a warrior who for some odd
reason kept telling our wizzie to summon a pet. the wiz was wearing a red
robe, /shrug. then he started to tell me (i was playing my enchanter):
"mana suck this frog!" and not just one time. he would point to a frog and
tell me to mana tap it. then tell the wiz to summon a pet. at first we kinda
made jokes: "dude, i never bought that spell!" But he didn;t seem to get it
and kept telling us what to do.

Finally i told him, "dude, just exactly how long is the recycle time on
theft of thought? when the spell is recycled - and when i need mana - trust
me - i will tap them. and btw, our wizzie cant summon pets worth a darn."

so, i dunno if our study is totally scientific, but its not just bards,
afaict

Sylly
